description: The ADVERSE_EVENT_GRADE table contains grade information about adverse event records for a patient.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adverse event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the grade for the adverse event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Present


Mild


Moderate


Severe


Life-threatening


Death

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The start date for this grade of the adverse event.
